text: Julian Burnlee CurryA Register of Admissions to King's College, Cambridge, 1945-1982, ed. John Bancroft, Martin Butler Booth, 1989, p. 172The Cambridge University List of Members up to 31 December 1991, p. 320 (8 December 1937 - 27 June 2020) was an English actor. He was best known for playing Claude Erskine-Browne in ITV's comedy-drama Rumpole of the Bailey. He was born in Devon, England. He also played Wing Commander Shurlock in Escape to Victory. Curry died on 27 June 2020, aged 82. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2020 deaths Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:English stage actors Category:English voice actors Category:Actors from Devon
title: Julian Curry
